#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
		char a[100001],c;
		int len,count=1,max,i;
		c='a';
		max=1;
		cin>>a;
		len=strlen(a);
		for(i=0;i<len;i++)
		{
			if(a[i+1]==a[i])
			{
				count++;
				if(max<count)
					max=count,c=a[i];
				else if(max==count)
				{
					if(a[i]-c<0)
						c=a[i];
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if(a[i]-c<0 && max==1)
				   c=a[i];
				count=1;

			}
		}
		cout<<c<<endl<<max<<endl;

	return 0;
}
